items.text: Withdrawal of a Person with Significant Control (PSC) statement

items.name: noPSC
items.label: The company knows or has reasonable cause to believe that there is no registrable person or registrable relevant legal entity in relation to the company.

items.name: stepsNotYetCompleted
items.label: The company has not yet completed taking reasonable steps to find out if there is anyone who is a registrable person or a registrable relevant legal entity in relation to the company.
aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa
items.text: Was the restriction withdrawn by the company or the court?
